title: (x) Sans serif typeface on "Industrial Design Served" - Apex Sans (Nina)
content:
Hey guys, I'm looking for the headline typeface being used here, "Industrial Design Served":

[http://www.industrialdesignserved.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719072559/http:/www.industrialdesignserved.com/ "http://www.industrialdesignserved.com/")

Or if you know of any that are similar, as it seems like I've seen a few in the past. Image attached, thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [industrial\_design.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719072559/http:/typophile.com/files/industrial_design.gif) | 2.81 KB |
author: ericcarl

comments.content:
Huh. Looks like Apex Sans to me.  
 [http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719072559/http:/vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://vllg.com/Thirstype/ApexSans/mudTyper+Weights/")
That would definitely appear to be it! Thanks a bunch, much appreciated.
